directions: Cook asparagus in boiling water in large uncovered skillet on medium-high heat 5 minutes or until tender-crisp. Drain well. Place on serving dish.
Stir parsley, basil and pepper into melted butter. Pour over asparagus. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
title: Basil and Parsley Asparagus
